# Time Shudder (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Magus Spells|Magus 2]], [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Summoner Spells|Summoner 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 4th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 4]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (a tiny hourglass)

**Range:** 30 ft.

**Area:** 30-ft.-radius emanation centered on you

**Duration:** 1 round

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Advanced Class Guide, pg. 196

You cause a ripple in time that affects all creatures in the area. At the start of each creatureâ€™s turn, there is a 50% chance the creature is hasted (as *[[Haste (Spell)|haste]]*); otherwise it is slowed (as *[[Slow (Spell)|slow]]*).
